name: FALLing asleep (benisaperson)
description:
FALL asleep, it's easy!

Keep your hunger, piss and urge-to-check-phone meters low by doing corresponding activities, but beware every second you spend not trying to sleep will deplete your sleepiness meter, making it harder to sleep.

See how fast you can get to sleep!

Made for the FALL themed Warwick Game Design Society game jam
